website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice if you need a form-fitting, formal maxi at a mid-range price.
pros: Suitable for formal occasions, yet comfortable
cons: Style is more formal and less versatile than others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Facebook and Instagram Approved
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I ordered this beautiful dress, but upon arrival, it was true to the measurements listed! How excited I was to wear it to a gala and feel glamorous! This is definitely a GREAT buy, and who can beat the price? Plus, you'll get an insane amount of Facebook and Instagram likes! HA!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Willacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect last minute dress..
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but felt it necessary for this dress. I had a black tie event on a Friday. I ordered this dress on THURSDAY. I got the dress at 12 pm the day of the event and it fit absolutely perfectly. I was getting compliments all night. I highly recommend! For ref: I'm a size 12, 5'3".
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Price - Fabulous Dress!!!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is FABULOUS!!! I am 5'8, 190 lbs and curvy so I ordered the XL. It fit perfectly. I received many compliments. The only complaint is the fact that the "nude" bodice is much too light for a lot of skin tones. The dress is still beautiful and fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B.

customer_reviews.title: Took it salsa dancing
customer_reviews.text: This dress looks exactly like the photo, just remember the obvious that it will look different on different body types and shapes. I am a pear shape. 5'8" at 260 lbs. Although the fit isn't exactly like on the model, the dress stretched and fit my body and looked as fancy as on the skinnier model. I got an XL and it fit just perfectly. It might feel tight while putting it on, but once you have it on, you will see why it feels so tight. It was comfortable to dance in and easy to move around in too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Dress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dress because my brother is getting married. This was my first online clothing purchase ever! BEST DECISION! I am always hesitant on buying online clothing. I'm a curvy hourglass size 12/14. I bought a Large and it fits like a dream! I love the lace/cotton stretch spandex feel!! This dress is just perfect! I want to wear it 24/7. The back is high like a Chinese collar. The neckline is deep and sexy! The sleeves are lace and it's just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Weirdo Ayesha

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Good quality! It fits perfect to my curvy shape. Exactly how it was advertised. I highly reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: katie Bluhm

customer_reviews.title: Best buy of the year
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love love this dress. I am 5'4 height 190 lb. Chest size 38DDD and it it fits like a glove. So comfortable and hides all the imperfections. Recommend for any occasion, got a Xl. Still is stretchy and comfortable!!!!! Worthy of the red carpet!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: XXL like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this stretches and fits all my curves in all the right places. I received many compliments on it at the wedding I wore it to. It was most definitely comfortable in the 7 hours I had to have it on. The drawback for me was it was a bit short and my heels made it even shorter. I'm 5' 8" and without shoes it just reaches the top of my foot. However with the right dainty stiletto sandals it still worked. I will warn you that Static Guard spray will be a must with this dress because the underlay is super clingy to the lace overlay. Great dress and quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: K & C Pro

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Great value for the price. Snags easily. Wish the under color was something besides the beige color to make it more elegant. I am 5'9" and the length works well for me but I am returning the dress as it looks vintage and old on me.
customer_reviews.author: ebbystouch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fitting and good quality! I'm surprised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and fast delivery, just as described. I was surprised since I didn't trust these China sellers, but I'm pleased. I'm a 5.8 tall full figured woman of 165 pounds, I ordered size L and it was amazing fit, I have big bust so fitting really surprised me. The wrapping was perfect and light weight, only one pound. The material was heavy, not cheapy as other China clothing, I was really surprised by the dress, it is gorgeous I had to try it right away just to send you photos. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dress to wear at 2 weddings last year and got tons of compliments on it. It is soft and falls beautifully. I'm 5'4 and 115 lbs.(33-25-37") got it in small and fits perfectly. Didn't need hemming at all, wore it with heels both times.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Daniela Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best dress for a night out on the town...red carpet ready! ❤
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dress! I wore to a blue diamond gala...stunning! One can easily dress up or down depending on engagement. I wore 3 inch heels; the length was perfect (preferred longer length for the look I wanted to achieve). I received a lot of compliments and if asked where I purchased...they were shocked. Most of all one cannot beat the price for an elegant dress. I ordered large (curvy girl 😊) very catering. The reviews are correct, if I could give more stars I would! Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: The traveling pants phenomenon in a dress . I am in love with this dress. So many compliments and I had a magical night. I recommend this beautiful dress.
customer_reviews.author: Grettel C Streiff

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful dress!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Beautiful dress! The color is amazing. I'm going to purchase the black one too.
customer_reviews.author: LUCY

customer_reviews.title: Lovely dress!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely dress and great fit due to the stretchy material. I am a size 16 and ordered the xl. Perfect!!! Gorgeous! Wore it for a wedding and received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. B

customer_reviews.title: matronly-good for mother of the bride
customer_reviews.text: Nice dress but too cheap and matronly looking on me. Big in the waist and not long enough for me. I got a small and im 5'5 34d-26-38.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this dress! Way better than one would guess for the price. Yes the materials and sewing are mass production level, but the comfort and ease of wear are far superior to even pricier dresses! This is definitely a go to dress for any last minute formal occasion. There is a lot of stretch in the fabric, so keep this in mind when sizing your order. Personally, I am a typical size 12/14 at 5'6 175lbs and ordered an XL, which was slightly loose in the hips.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Most compliments I've ever gotten on a dress
customer_reviews.text: I got this in blue and had my first compliment within one minute of leaving the house, from a total stranger. They kept on coming all night, so only wear this if you don't mind being noticed! I will say this runs small - I am six feet tall, an 18/20, and the 3X is snug. Foundation garments mandatory if you want a smooth, tight look. The sleeves are also snug but not cutting off circulation or anything. Overall, this is an incredible steal and a dress you can wear for so many occasions. Dress it down with simple hair, minimal makeup and only one piece of jewelry. Nothing needed to dress it up!
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: This dress was a hit. Fit perfect, came packed well, and only needed to iron interlining. Ordered a larger-size 12
customer_reviews.author: Olivia @fit4apear

customer_reviews.title: This dress is a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress. I generally wear a snug size 12. I'm a full-figured woman; 5'3" and 180-185 lbs. with 36DD chest and a big butt and thighs. I ordered a large. It fits snug down to the top of my thighs but comfortable. I don't have to worry about buying spanx. I'm wearing a 3" heel and the dress doesnt drag. The dress is great quality and not itchy. The "V" neck isn't too low. It's a very classy looking dress. Note: I don't recommend this dress if you have a big belly. It won't fit right if at all over your stomache and will draw attention to your belly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fabric and fit
customer_reviews.text: So I was pleasantly surprised about how nice the fabric and fit of this dress was. I am 5'10 and it was a little short but not so much that I couldn't just add a minor piece of black lace to fix it. On my body it looked a little matronly since I have hips but I loved the neckline and sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flattering, lightweight, fashionable... need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5", 115 lbs and this dress fits me perfectly. I ordered a small. It is a little staticky but with a little hair spray up the skirt and a little underskirt, that problem was solved. Would be the perfect bridesmaid dress! Wearing to a black tie event! I think I'm going to order another one! It barely touches the floor with no shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dress, Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to write a review of this dress. This dress fit perfectly. I ordered a 2x and the fit was great. It is true to size and the dress is beautiful on. I am 5'7" tall and approximately 240 in weight. I also have a very ample bust at 42G. I am normally a size 18 in pants and 18W in shirts because of my boobs. It is also very comfortable. I would encourage anyone looking for a formal gown that is also comfortable to try this dress. I am very satisfied with this purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dress!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful. When I first tried it on I was thinking about sending it back because I didnt like the way how my stomach looked in it but I decided to stick with the dress and I bought spadex shorts which covered my stomach to wear underneath the dress. I would reccomend that for any lady purchasing this dress for a more appropriate, firm, and slimming look. I also wore an undershirt with the dress for a more modest look. If you choose not to wear an undershirt, some cleavage will be showing (just a note). I wear a size 14 and I bought an XL and it fit perfectly. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Dress!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it ! Dress is gorgeous , I'm 5'6, length is perfect. Very comfortable even with my 3 month pregnant belly. So happy with my purchase. Ladies to be accurate with sizes you can always review the "dress size table" online that's how i choose mine. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa C Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit and for a tall curvy woman.
customer_reviews.text: This dress was great. I had to do a 1940's theme and this dress did the job with red lipstick and red nails. I'm 5.8" and I weigh 163 Lb. I have been trying to loose weight so I still have a bit of a tummy. I wore a sinch under the dress to suck that tummy in and it worked perfect. Here are pictures without the under garments.
customer_reviews.author: michael d jones

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS DRESS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dress based on all of the fantastic reviews and photos. Yes, this is THE magic dress for nearly every body time. The number of compliments I received was off the charts. My specs: 5'8", 170, a bit thick around the middle. Wore it to a masquerade ball and it was a total hit. The length was perfect, not too short, as some other reviews mentioned - I suspect this was because I purchased an XL. BUY THIS DRESS - you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT fit, comfortable, elegant...this dress has it all!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 14/16 and ordered an XL--it fits PERFECT! There is no zipper in this dress--just slides over your head. The lining of the dress is a cotton-like stretch material with beautiful black stretch lace on top. This dress is perfect for my award banquet coming up. The other great thing is that it can be packed up very tightly and doesn't wrinkle--perfect for travel. I am so impressed with this dress and I received it sooner than expected (less than a week from ordering it!).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Felt comfortable and fantastic wearing it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought an XL size. This dress would fit any kind of shape body. The style makes it like that. It’s a stretchy fabric absolutely perfect. I have curves and the dress accentuate them. I wear the dress with a 3.5 inches heels and the seam of the dress was at ground level. I’m 5.5” tall The only thing I noticed is that in my back there was this extra fabric or too loose so I had to sew it in about 2 inches in. But no complaints. Got many compliments! I felt very comfortable and fantastic in it. What can I say I’m a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Marquez

customer_reviews.title: AWKWARD!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this dress! I tried to love this dress! I first ordered a Large since I usually wear a size 12 in dresses, it seemed a bit snug around the belly so I returned it and ordered an XL. SO AWKWARD! It turns out it wasn’t that the L didn’t fit, it’s just designed super awkwardly. The waist/belly/hip area has these strips of lace, I guess you’d call it, and it totally accentuates that “problem area”. Unless you are super thin and no belly I’d save your money. Now I have to get yet another dress.
customer_reviews.author: Emstaylo

customer_reviews.title: XXL
customer_reviews.text: My height is 5'7 and weight 200. Ordered a size larger according to others posts. It was ready to wear right out of the bag. Perfect for my evening.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress! Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: Based on all the positive reviews and pictures I decided to order this dress for a new years eve wedding. I am super happy with the qualitly, the fit and the look of this dress. I am 5'5" and a 133 pounds. I ordered a small and it fit well. The lycra holds everything in nicely. Although I did wear a tummy control shaper top though just to smooth things out a little. My friend who used to be an editor for brides magazine saw my dress and asked it it was made by a certain designer- but i cant remember the name. So this really looks like a high end dress! What and amazing deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lidman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dress for the Holidays
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to a Scholarship Ball and to a New Year's Eve Dinner/Dance. It was perfect. Lace is definitely in this year though, so there were other's there with lace dresses on. But, this dress was one of the best. I suggest black satin, peep toe pumps to go with this dress. I chose black lace, peep toe pumps (4 1/4" so I didn't have to get it hemmed, I'm a shorty) to match the dress, but plain black satin would have been better. I didn't need a necklace. I just wore some dangling rocks and a sparkly cuff bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Phyl'licia L. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: great for a curvy lady too!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased other more traditional formal dresses from an anchor store at the mall and decided to give this one a try too. I loved the vintage style of this dress and got it in black and up one size to a XL. I am 5'7" / 170 lbs with a small chest. The other four more expensive dresses went back to the store and I wore this adorable and very flattering unique dress. I received so many compliments. It flattered my curves and fit with enough form fit but not to tight. So happy with the price and dress!! Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kadrovach

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but segments my body
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dress in black, size XL. I have a plus sized hour glass figure and find A lined dresses flatter my body best. This dress is pretty and true to size. However, the diagonal lace trim in the hip area pulled on me making my body look cut off and segmented, instead of long and trimm as pictured. If the dress didn't have the diagonal trim detailing, it would have been perfect for me. The lace trim is sown into the dress, not on it, so it cannot be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I'm 5' and wear size 6/8. So I ordered size M. Looks really pretty and the quality is great! Very happy with this dress
customer_reviews.author: Notre Dame

customer_reviews.title: Dang!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is surprisingly beautiful. I'm a size 6, 5'8", and a Medium fit perfectly. It looks expensive and lovely. Length was perfect. I can wear heels, and it still touches the floor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bray

customer_reviews.title: True to size and fits so comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. It's SO comfortable. But because it's a stretch to fit you should make sure you buy your true to size, size. I normally wear a size 8 and feel more comfortable in a 10. I bought the XL and it was WAY too big! The medium would have been perfect. I gave the XL to a friend as a gift and she loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MD Margenau

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Very comfortable and yes need static guard but no big deal. I cannot wait to wear this dress to my brother's wedding in 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: TbearLynn

customer_reviews.title: The dress is very comfortable, and didn't show as much cleavage as I ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dress a week prior to an annual work gala. I figured with Amazon prime, I could have the dress in two days with some leeway to find another dress if this didn't work out. I am 5'5" and weigh about 155lb; a large fit well. The dress is very comfortable, and didn't show as much cleavage as I thought (a good thing, in my case!). The only thing is if you have a little bit of a tummy, you will probably want to wear spanx! It will definitely show. And with my work event being a dinner, spanx will be a must for me. Overall, however, I'd recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Gladfelter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am 165 lbs and the Large fit perfect Material has some spandex .
customer_reviews.author: Yuby

customer_reviews.title: Held Its Own at a Swanky Downtown Wedding
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to an evening wedding at an exclusive city club. It arrived it a bag the day before and didn't need to be pressed. The dress, combined with pair of Spanx underneath, looked wonderful and was extremely comfortable. I received compliments all night long saying what a "knockout" it was...it definitely held its own against several Rent-A-Runway gowns that night. The best part was being able to ball it up into my overnight bag the next morning without worries!
customer_reviews.author: shellyc711

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this dress. I purchased for my daughters wedding. I'm only 42 and felt like everything out there made me look like a grandma. This dress is the perfect combination of sexy and classy.I am a true size 12. Hourglass leaning towards pear shaped. This dress fit me perfectly no alterations needed. I ordered the XL and am 5'4", wore with heels. Perfect length. Has a little bit of stretch which made it super comfortable. I did wear spanx just to make sure my shape was on point.
customer_reviews.author: L. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Believe what you read, this is an amazing dress!!!
customer_reviews.text: Reading previous reviews on sizing, I am a 10/12 but ordered a Large. I am 5'10" and this dress came to my ankles. It was perfect. The fit was perfect and I think since I went a size up, it was long enough and I didn't need to wear any shape wear. It was also very comfortable and I packed it for a trip and thanks to the material, NO WRINKLES!!! I wore it to "Formal Night" on a Cruise and I was stopped several times by women, complimenting me on my dress. They didn't believe that I bought it on Amazon. I am sooooo glad I did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kedispaghetti

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice dress with only a couple of problems. Problem one - it's a little long for me. I can fix it with some tall shoes, but it might be tough for ladies who are shorter, at least with the large. I generally wear a large, being that I'm 5'5" and 160lbs, and this large seems to have a comfortable amount of room, even in the arms, which is generally a problem for me. Problem two - there's a band at the back meant to frame your derriere, but the lining keeps it from being secure, so there will likely be some tugging to keep it in place. But for the price, this dress is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Dean L

customer_reviews.title: The dress was so comfortable and size was accurate!
customer_reviews.text: .Perfect fit. XL ordered. I love how comfortable the lace is. Very soft and stretchable. I am size 14 depending on brand and chest size 38D. Love this dress! It is so pretty on. I bought this dress because of the price and I am so happy I did! I added crystals to the sewn in belt and it just took this dress to an other level of elegance! If you are looking for a dress to make you feel beautiful but keep you on budget, I suggest you buy this dress!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dress at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: A friend suggested this dress to me and omg am I pleased!!! The quality was amazing and the fit was superb!! I felt sexy and age appropriate. I'm 5'2" and typically wear 12/14 and ordered the large .. I could've used the XL but with appropriate "under garments", it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra S

customer_reviews.title: OMG, this is dress is so flattering and very comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: OKAY Y'ALL, I ordered this dress for a wedding at the last minute because I had jumped the gun in Feb and ordered a short dress and i was told 2 weeks before the wedding all the bridesmaids were wearing long dresses. SO i ordered this one to see if it would fit because i usually don't wear form fitting dresses. BUT OMG, this is so flattering and very comfy!!! And I was not hot at all during the entire wedding. I normally, wear a large or size 12 but i did read the reviews and ordered a size up just in case. Perfect fit for an XL and it's a bit stretchy so it was perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE

customer_reviews.title: Really great dress! I got so many compliments and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great dress! I got so many compliments and my friends couldn't believe I paid so little! Definitely comparable to dresses that were $200+! I am 5'1", 136lbs, and I think a 38D (in breastfeeding so it's hard to tell lol) and the large fit great! It was a little long for me but being a shorty most dresses are and with a pair of heels (4" I believe) it looked great! You'll definitely want some static guard and a lent roller if you have pets!
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Love the whole line of dresses
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dress!! I was apprehensive because of the low price but it's amazing. It's nice and light weight. I have never received so many compliments as I did the night inside this gown. Size was perfect , even the height . I am 5'2 so if you are on the tall dude you might struggle. I love it so much I bought it in the blue version and the short cocktail dress version.
customer_reviews.author: riley

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I just receved this dress today and OMGosh!!! This dress is GORGEOUS!! I have a formal event to go to and didn't want to spend a lot, this dress fit the bill. The fit is extremely flattering. I am 5'7 and the length is perfect. My measurements are 42-38-47. I ordered the 2X based on reviews (usually a 1X), best decision! I can't wait to wear this in a few weeks. The hubby kept making me turn around, so I know it is doing wonders for the back veiw!! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove and has a little bit of stretch. The lace is soft and silky and not cheap and not plastic like. The lace is thick and semi heavy and the inner liner is soft silky and covers fully so no need for worry of undergarments (or not!) showing thru. I also won’t worry about being chilly on Halloween or this ripping. So well made, I wish I could wear it year round.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Page

customer_reviews.title: not sure what the excitement is about
customer_reviews.text: I read the amazing reviews and gave it a try. it looked cheap, and the tendency to accumulate static made it look only tackier. The skirt came very long (i'm 5'4). The cut was not particularly flattering. (I saw a ton of reviews from even women in the teens saying this dress fit beautifully) I wear a size 10/12 and have a flatter belly and ordered a large, which was the right size, however those diagonal lines at the hips just did everything wrong for the hips and tummy. It went straight back.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But here's what you need to know...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my dress (in black) and love it! I'm 5'4, 120 lbs and ordered a small. Fits perfectly. Will be great for my holiday party because the lining underneath and longer sleeves - Will help keep me warm. You need to know it's a pull on dress though. Has to go over your head. Ideally it would zip up the back or the side, but it doesn't. Also, if you've got tummy pooch of any kind, you'll need a slimmer of some kind underneath. The control top of pantyhose would be perfect for tummy support with this dress. If you're thinking about it - just do it! It's fantastic. Totally classy!
customer_reviews.author: AC Tap

customer_reviews.title: I looked amazing in this dress
customer_reviews.text: I looked amazing in this dress. I was going to the Connecticut Governor's Ball and I was short on cash for a dress. Bought this and I got so many compliments in it. I felt really pretty that night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this dress.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore this dress. It fit perfectly accordingly to the size chart. The cloth was somewhat on the heavy side (which is desirable for me). The material was thick which hid bra straps and panty curves very discreetly. Have no bad reviews for this product at all, felt perfect for a formal dinner occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Breeze

customer_reviews.title: basically jersey t-shirt material horribly sewn into the lace as a liner
customer_reviews.text: Got the dress for a black tie event... I found it to be very cheaply made, basically jersey t-shirt material horribly sewn into the lace as a liner! I would not reccomend if you are purchasing for a black tie! It will be very obvious it was extremely cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: but I wore it with nice heels!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to a black tie event - received MANY compliments. I originally ordered a M (5'4", 170 lbs) but had to order a large for it to fit... was a bit long, but I wore it with nice heels!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect much for this dress but when I tried it on it was a perfect fit and i got it in 4 days
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5/4 ,140 pounds and I order the medium size. Didn't expect much for this dress but when I tried it on it was a perfect fit and i got it in 4 days. I'm happy and highly recommended 😊
customer_reviews.author: Miguel R. Marquez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Packing was damaged, and the dress is small
customer_reviews.text: The package was cut. On both sides. The dress came in a box with another dress so it was packed like that. It smelled “processed” Awful! The dress runs REALLY small. I couldn’t even get it over my chest. The style is pretty, the color is nice, but it’s way too small. I found another dress that I love and it’s free returns so it’s not too bad. If you try this dress, buy 1 or 2 sizes up if you are curvy.
customer_reviews.author: Kadi

customer_reviews.title: ... dress becaise i trusted the reviews and was not disappointed. It beautiful on the body and looks much ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dress becaise i trusted the reviews and was not disappointed. It beautiful on the body and looks much more expensive than the pried paid. I am 1.65 m and i always wear 12 for pants and dresses, howeve i am chesty so i bought xl and fit perfectly, if you are smaller on top you can go for a l. I hope i have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Anabueno

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress! Ordered my regular sized but had to return bc it was too small. Not a problem bc they have free returns. quickly received one size up and it fits perfect. I've gotten so many compliments on this dress. My favorite part is the neckline. Minimal jewelry is required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size Small 5'5" 132-138lb 36B
customer_reviews.text: This dress is great in every way. Fit is lovely, price is a dream - looks more expensive than it is, both fabrics have stretch - so it's comfortable. All around great. My figure is more hour glass, but I have had 3 kids in under 2 yrs, so my mid section is a bit bigger. I think when I add Spanx I should feel very confident in this gown. I'm wearing it to a wedding, I purchased the black and nude version.
customer_reviews.author: Searching09

customer_reviews.title: It's better than I imagined!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is a steal at under $60! So many compliments. The lace is soft yet delicate. The lining was nude which made me a little nervous buying online and not seeing beforehand but it works with this dress. Beautiful dress that was a perfect fit. I'm 5'5" and 125 pounds. A little snug in the top, I'm 34 D and it was fitted but not uncomfortable. It is a v neck but not as low as it appeared in some pictures. Overall, amazing buy. Muisol makes great affordable dresses!
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful dress, especially for the price. I bought the navy blue, and it's gorgeous. Only complaints - the lace at the front V doesn't match perfectly, so the neckline is slightly asymmetrical. Also, the dress went to the floor, so I had to hem it - to be expected with such a stretchy fit, that the length will be different on anyone. I was so impressed with NO zippers or hooks - the fabric is beautiful, and curve hugging. I did have to wear some Spanx to smooth out the silhouette, but I'm sure most gals under 40 won't need that.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hippe

customer_reviews.title: for the right body shape I think folks will like this dress
customer_reviews.text: I am in between sizes so based on reviews I thought I ordered correctly. Nope. Now it could be my body shape but it didn't fit in a flattering way. Its a very sexy comfy dress but you must wear with a spanx-like item for it to work nicely. I am short, plus size, pear shaped gal and I think this would do well with someone that is more hourglass shaped. Apple shaped folks (top heavy) would probably do well with this dress as it accentuates the hips and breasts. For me, if I went up a size to fit my hips better, it would be loose in the top area so I will not be trying another size.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: This dress is beautiful! I didn't know that it stretches
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful! I didn't know that it stretches, but not it makes sense to why so many reviews rave about how comfortable it is. I am usually an 8 or a 10 in dresses but I followed the sizing chart, swallowed my pride (lol) and ordered a large. I'm glad I did because it was the correct size for me in this dress. I bought this dress for photo shoots I do by myself and it's loveliness exceeded my expectations. I am very happy with my purchase 😊😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Convenient, and Plus Size friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a stunning dress for the price. I needed a floor length gown for a Mardi Gras ball ASAP and with prime had this one in two days. I wasn't expecting how well made it is, and how gorgeous the blue is in person. It's one of the comfiest dresses I've ever worn which isn't something I often say about outfits for formal events. Will be reordering another color or two.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit
customer_reviews.text: The dress is simply beautiful,but it hugs a little,nothing a good girdle can't fix.The material is quality ,much better than my previous order.Truefully this brand is pretty good.I ordered a 2x because I'm a 18w and 5'8.I do recommend this dress but make sure you order the correct size because it runs a tad bit small.Go for it ladies you will be delighted.😃😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Wegowoman

customer_reviews.title: Elegant dress
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress. It fits perfectly, true to size. The color is a little lighter than the picture. I'm 5'8 and will not need alterations to the length.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for wedding
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dress (burgundy color) for my sons fall wedding...MOG...to be held in October 2020 in Florida. It will be a church wedding to be held inside so I am not concerned about the 3/4 sleeves. The dress fit perfectly and is very comfortable, however, I am unsure if it is what I am looking for. It is a great dress, fits very well and completely lined which is great. I got many compliments from my family. I may decide to keep it, just because :). The price is right as well. You will not be disappointed in this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not intended for the lumpy-bumpy self conscious non dress wearing person.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the navy blue in 3x to wear for an upcoming wedding. I ordered according to measurements and it fit, just not in a way I would wear. I also felt like the line, I imagine is there for the slimming effect, is in an odd place. The dress is well-made with a heavy lined silky fabric and it is beautiful. Overall, this style of dress does not compliment my body shape, or I am too self- conscious, either way it is gorgeous and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dress!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress. My wife is 5' 6" and it hits the floor like it should and looks wonderful on her!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and Comfortable Stretch Lace
customer_reviews.text: Just another rave review. At 5'5" at about 150 lbs. this dress fits like a glove without being too tight. Size L. I wanted a holiday formal and this is IT. Great cruise dress as it is foldable. Lace is stretchy and the underlining is better than what you would expect for the price. Caveat.... this is not a "high end" feeling dress- it won't give you the skin feel of a $200 plus dress. But it is remarkably comfortable and LOOKS expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs big
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a mother of the groom dress. The dress fit well, a little big. I am a size 12 and picked up a 14. Reviews said it ran small. Felt it was to Matronly, so order several other dresses. I'm also 5'5, it would need to be hemmed about 2-3" depending on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Loved the dress
customer_reviews.text: Loved the dress. I got a size 8, and it was true to size. I am 5'2 and was about 128 when I wore the dress. I added my own shapewear underneath and it was a great fit. The dress was definately too long for me, and I didn't have time to get it hemmed, but it was manageable with some heals and holding the dress up. Definately get it hemmed, though, if you are short and you have the time. I would definately recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bambino

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress! It was such a surprise that it fit so well! I love the stretch lace and the soft tshirt-like lining underneathe. I wore it to a wedding last weekend and received compliments and inquiries as to where I purchased the dress. They were blown away at my report and especially at the pricetag! You will be receiving more orders soon, get ready! It does need to be sprayed with Static Guard, but other than that, it is an amazing dress -- so classy, so comfortable, and an amazing price! I am 5'10" and I ordered an x-large, I wear a size 12-14. It was perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this lovely dress
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7'' and 135ish, with a 35-inch bust, and the medium is a very good fit. The length is perfect with 2-inch heels, though without shoes the hem drags on the ground a little. The under $50 price tag made me wonder if it would be a flimsy, 'one and done' sort of dress, but it is actually very well constructed and easily withstood a nine hour day (including a lot of dancing!) without ripping or pulling out of shape. I've hand washed and flat-dried it without a problem, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lancy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good with some stretch.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on. The dress has some stretch which is helpful for individual types. there is a small trim piece on the outside of the dress over the seams at the hips area that does not show up well in the pictures, and this does not stretch as well as the rest of the dress so there is some pulling here. I am usually a Large-Xl body type, and the XL is snug. the stretch helps, but if there was no stretch, this would not fit. It is long. I'm 5'7'' and wearing heals it still probably touches the floor all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Aman Custom

customer_reviews.title: I love this dress cause there is no zipper in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress cause there is no zipper in the dress and fabric is stretchable. Nice and comfortable....and pretty too. However the front part of the dress is kinda defective. The lace fabric has coulple loose and pulls threads. I bought this and received it 2 days before my friend's wedding, Don't think the replacement will make it here on time. But I will definitely get this again for my next party event.
customer_reviews.author: Black Cat

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dress
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about a $45 dress, but was pleasantly surprised. It looks better than I expected, sexy, yet elegant. For reference, I'm 5'2" 150#, 36DD, usually wear a size 8-10 dress & M/L top. I ordered a large and fit like a glove. I have 3 1/2" heels on and the length just barely touches the floor which should be fine, glad I don't have to hem it. I can't wait to wear it to a formal charity event next week.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: I saw the reviews before purchasing but didn't think it was going to be JUST PERFECT!! I got a size large
customer_reviews.text: Waaaoooo! I saw the reviews before purchasing but didn't think it was going to be JUST PERFECT!! I got a size large, 168pounds 5' 3"? I got the most compliments in a dress EVER!!! Beautiful Beautiful!! I got the red one too, can't wait for an occasion to wear it :)!
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Such a steal!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dress for the price. I can't believe this is $50! It's comfortable, classy and very flattering. The V-neck is cut perfectly...not too low. I'm a size 8/10 and 36D and the L fit best so I kept that instead of the M. I'm also 5'0'' so I had to have a few inches taken out. Don't hesitate getting this. Prepare for compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price and Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: This dress was more beautiful than I expected for the price. I purchased a 2XL, and it fit me really well. I'm 5'5", and the length was perfect with my 4" heels. I do suggest static guard to avoid any cling. I got many compliments when I wore it to my cousin's wedding.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: 6-months pregnant and I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly let me say that I was 6-months pregnant wearing this dress. Because of this reason, I ended up ordering a size larger than I would have normally. The right sleeve seemed a little tight. And the dress was shorter than I expected but ended up being a perfect length for my 5'-4" height; I was able to wear lower more comfortable heels. The bow sat perfectly upon the top of my belly. But the seam that is below that bow-seam was not very flattering around back; it kept sliding up and was tight on the rear. But it all ended up working perfectly. Very comfortable dress!! Even 6-months pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty dress!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lovely dress. The fit was perfect! It looked just like the picture. I do agree with one of the other reviewers who said it would be nice if the sleeves had the same lace detail as the neckline. But, I am sure if you can find lace to match you can probably do a little addition yourself. I recommend ordering the size you wear now. I read the other reviews and they all said pretty much the same thing "the fit is pretty good to size" I would have preferred if someone had said if you're a small order the small and if you're a medium order the medium and so on and so forth.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVED the dress
customer_reviews.text: I don't ever write reviews but i felt compelled to write this one. I absolutely LOVED the dress. I am a size 10/12 right now so I ordered the large. Based on the reviews I read it felt like a safe bet. I only had 1 day before i was leaving out of town for a wedding. Thank god it came on time. I was beautiful. It fit great!!! I got so many compliments. The dress fits really nice and does not make you feel fat. It is very elegant for the price. It was extremely comfortable too. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress. I will wear it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: knock out dress!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this dress!!!! I am a larger women so I did wear shape wear underneath to smooth. It felt very casual and comfortable, at the same time I felt so beautiful! This dress is so elegant looking. I really felt like the most beautiful woman wearing this dress! I generally wear like an 18 jean and a 14/16 top. So i ordered the xl in black and it was perfect. The dress didn't really cling like the other reviews said so I didn't need to spray anything. Ladies if you want to feel gorgeous, this is the dress!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mellon

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Miusol dress last year and love it! I don't see the dark green listed right now. I recall the color was brighter in the photo but it clearly states dark green. Be gentle using the zipper especially if you have a sway back. The material is a tad stretchy but be gentle with it. It is a tad long but being 5'3 I run into that issue a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mbella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Dress fits great! The dress is beautiful and fits snug but doesn't make you look like a stuffed sausage:) But for us women who have a little tummy wear a tummy control garment. I have no complaints and would recommend:) I am 5'5 weight is sadly "178". But hey the dress is great!!! I ordered an Xl:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful dress. Very classy and elegant looking. I am 5'10" and wear a 10/12. I ordered this in XL and it fits perfect. The hem reaches to my ankle. I would prefer a little longer, but at almost six-feet tall, I've learned to live with shorter hems. The material is nice and not too thick or thin. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Torylk

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, because of the material I was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore this dress, in red, to a formal dinner cruise. I received it on a Wednesday late afternoon and had to have it packed Thursday morning. Fortunately, because of the material I was able to throw the dress in the washer, hang dry it over night, lighltly steam a few lace details on the neck line and the dress was beautiful and maintained it's shape and size. I am curvy and the dress conformed perfectly to my curves. I received so many compliments wearing this dress!!! Even a little girl in an elevator full of people wearing formal wear complimented me specifically on how much she liked my dress. Definitely a confidence booster. :)
customer_reviews.author: K Hanke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Was too small for me (size 18-20). Fit my cousin perfectly (size16, height 5’5). Just add some shapewear for a perfect fit and you have an amazingly beautiful dress. Very well made. Nice and sturdy. I imagine the lace would snag on jewelry. Bought a similar style dress at the department store and would pay 3x as much. Great deal on a beautiful dress. Wish it fit me :(
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dress
customer_reviews.text: Super soft lace. Im a size 8/10 U.S. Has a nice cut of material minimizing butt 😊 If a flash goes off w a pic it will reflect to make under liner (peachy color) more aparent. Loved it! (Ps name is under my husbands lol)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas struble

customer_reviews.title: and will definitely buy again because of this great experience!
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove this dress! Large fits my 5'7 1/2", 158 lbs frame just right, although I usually wear a medium. Most reviews spot on about the fit to get a size up. Second time to buy a dress in Amazon and first time with this brand, and will definitely buy again because of this great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Nayve

customer_reviews.title: the liner is cheapish but the overlay that you actually see is very nice. Felt great
customer_reviews.text: Was invited to a "formal" wedding and bought this in a last-minute panic. True American sizes, didn't think sleeves were too tight at all, the liner is cheapish but the overlay that you actually see is very nice. Felt great, although it is on the stretchy side/not structured so spanx made me feel more smoothed out; received lots of complements. (Many people's formal dress at the 20-something wedding in NYC was "cocktail", for those who are also unaware of the current definitions but I would wear it again.)
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Bizarre Seam Ruins it All
customer_reviews.text: The dress generally fits well. It was a little long which I was okay with because I was fine with getting it hemmed, but I cannot get over the bizarre seam that falls over my stomach and hips. It draws attention to the less flattering parts of my body that would otherwise go unnoticed. In the first photo in the description of the dress, it is not even present. It’s terrible and unflattering and honestly, unnecessary. I had to return the dress because of that seam.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this dress . Fits as expected it actually goes on right over your head as it is a stretchable fabric. If you do have a muffin top or any type of that situation going on I would recommend Spanx, I Am 5-3 weigh about a hundred pounds so I did have to get platform shoes to wear with it unless you're good at sewing then you can just hem it. It's just a easy dress to wear. Not extremely lightweight does have a little bit of weight to it. Hope that helps in making your decision. I ordered the red and I think I'm going to go back and order the black also.
customer_reviews.author: syns10

customer_reviews.title: Very classy and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dress. I did order a medium originally which is my normal size. I am 5'6" and 128 lbs. I have broad shoulders with muscular arms. I am 34B chest, 28 waist, 36 low hip. The medium was too big. It wasn't severely noticeable but it didn't cling around like it should have especially at the waist. I then ordered a small and it was perfect. Clingy but not at all tight. Could easily have stretched in arms, chest, waist, butt and still been comfortable. Both sizes just barely touched the floor without shoes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Spivak

customer_reviews.title: Love this Dress!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2, 130lbs., size 6, 36-B chest. I ordered this dress in a small and medium, and the medium fit best. I returned the small. I wore 2.5" heels, and the dress was still a little long, but it didn't interfere with walking. The sleeves were longer on me, but most 3/4 sleeves are because I'm short. I liked the neckline as well. I was worried that it would be too low and revealing. but it was a nice modest v-neck. the dress didn't need any steaming or ironing, and the price was oh, so right!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Miusol Women's Floral Lace 2/3 Sleeves Long Bridesmaid Maxi Dress
feature_bullets: This Authentic item was sold by Qinke Fashion,Please Check Out Carefully when you BUY!!!
